result.title: Pizza Hut: Pizza Delivery | Pizza Carryout | Coupons | Wings and More
result.description: Order pizza online for fast delivery or carryout from a store near you. View our full menu, see nutritional information, find store locations, and more.

result.title: Papa John's Pizza | Order for Delivery or Carryout
result.description: Each Papa John's pizza is carefully crafted with flavorful, superior-quality ingredients and toppings. Order pizza online for delivery or carryout.
